code:
import{createApi,fetchBaseQuery}from"@reduxjs/toolkit/query/react";// define a service user a base URL
var appApi=createApi({reducerPath:"appApi",baseQuery:fetchBaseQuery({baseUrl:"http://localhost:5001"}),endpoints:function endpoints(builder){return{// creating the user
signupUser:builder.mutation({query:function query(user){return{url:"/users",method:"POST",body:user};}}),// login
loginUser:builder.mutation({query:function query(user){return{url:"/users/login",method:"POST",body:user};}}),// logout
logoutUser:builder.mutation({query:function query(payload){return{url:"/logout",method:"DELETE",body:payload};}})};}});var useSignupUserMutation=appApi.useSignupUserMutation,useLoginUserMutation=appApi.useLoginUserMutation,useLogoutUserMutation=appApi.useLogoutUserMutation;export{useSignupUserMutation,useLoginUserMutation,useLogoutUserMutation};export default appApi;
